definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
hell on earth (idiom); suffering the torments of Buddhist hell while still alive/fig. having an uncomfortable time
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth

sentences.english: Before liberation my family led a hell of a life.
sentences.chinese: 解放前我家过着地狱般的生活。

sentences.english: This, however, happens only during the first hundred years of their damnation.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况只发生在他们进地狱的头一百年。

sentences.english: Better to reign in hell than serve in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 宁在天堂为王，不到地狱当差。

sentences.english: The day a Chinese multi-billionaire takes over Hollywood will be the time hell freezes over.
sentences.chinese: 中国亿万富翁接管好莱坞的那一天地狱都会冻结。

sentences.english: Also, the whole concept of “goto hell” was abandoned.
sentences.chinese: 而且，“下地狱去吧”这样的理念没有了。

sentences.english: In short, pigs can fly, and hell really can freeze over.
sentences.chinese: 简单点说，猪也能飞了，地狱也封冻了。

sentences.english: In high school the door, unfamiliar environment like hell.
sentences.chinese: 踏入高中那扇大门，陌生的环境犹如地狱般可怕。

sentences.english: The Bian city king occupies just northern fertile burnt stone under of yell the earth jail.
sentences.chinese: 卞城王占据正北方沃焦石下的叫唤大地狱。

sentences.english: She was really in a dilemma. Will the love lead to the heaven or the hell?
sentences.chinese: 这确实让芊芊很为难，爱该走向天堂，还是逃出地狱？

sentences.english: Hell for some time, full of murderous look will become more angry.
sentences.chinese: 地狱持续一段时间后，充满杀气的怒吼会变多。

sentences.english: Better to rule in hell than serve in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 宁在地狱当主，不在天堂为奴。

sentences.english: Atlas: I have woken the torment of the underworld, vanished to the darkest pit of Hades .
sentences.chinese: 我唤醒了地狱中的痛苦，在冥王最黑暗的深渊中隐去。

sentences.english: Or can seduce the sea demon that the person goes to perdition?
sentences.chinese: 还是能勾引人下地狱的海妖？

sentences.english: And I see you've brought the mighty Hellscream.
sentences.chinese: 我也看到你将强大的地狱咆哮给带来了。

sentences.english: The equal king occupies a southwest square fertile burnt stone under of snout the earth jail.
sentences.chinese: 平等王占据西南方沃焦石下的阿鼻大地狱。

definition: Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
lit. nest of devils/place occupied by sinister forces
